name: The Outsider EP (NEW)
description:
**FREE WITH THE PURCHASE OF ANY TEE**

Recorded at Strangeways Recording in Providence, RI between June and July, 2011. Produced by Mike Poorman and Life on Hold. Mixed and engineered by Mike Poorman. Mastered by Mike Fossenkemper at Turtle Tone Studios in New York City, NY. Layout and Design by Lane Atteridge.

 
Additional Musicians:

Tim White- Add'l Vocals (Track 4) 
Zac Clark- Organ (Tracks 3, 5)
Joe Ballaro- Pedal Steel (Tracks 4, 5)
Michael Coelho-Cello (Track 1), Fiddle (Track 4) 
Kendall DiTommaso- Flute (Track 3), Add'l Vocals (Tracks 3, 5)
Theresa Cleary- Add'l Vocals (Tracks 3, 5)
Laura Bailey- Accordion (Track 1)
Mick Fridley- Banjo, Mandolin (Track 4)

Track Listing:

1. The Wanderer
2. One for the Foxes
3. Best Bet
4. Whisperfolk
5. The Outsider

name: The Run-Around EP
description:
Recorded 2010 with Mike Poorman at Strangeways Recording in Providence, RI.  Mastered by Mike Fossenkemper at Turtletone Studios in New York, NY. 

Track Listing:

1. Tranquil Minds, Troubled Hearts
2. Star in a Stone Boat
3. Forever and Always
4. The Go-Getter
5. Spoken With Words Beyond Me
6. The Greatest Letdown of the Century
7. Atlantic Summer

name: The Element of Surprise EP
description:
Released July 2008, recorded, produced, and mixed with Mike Poorman at Strangeways Studio, Providence, RI.  Mastered by Nick Zampiello at New Alliance East, Cambridge, MA.  

Tracks:

1) Far Too Sensual To Be Conventional
2) Banking on Breaking
2) Honey (I Blame You)
4) Balladeer
